VIII.i.1.A.4.a
.
Presumptive Herbicide Exposure in Thailand
The PACT Act added a presumption of herbicide exposure for Veterans who served in Thailand at any United States or Royal Thai base during the period beginning on January 9, 1962, and ending on June 30, 1976.Â  Apply the procedures outlined in the
PACT Act Implementation SOP
when processing a claim based on service in Thailand.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) Based on Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
